title: How to Play
step1: Your mission is to convert the decimal number into its binary representation before the time runs out.
step2: Each round you will be presented with a random decimal number.
step3: The binary code field will be displayed as a series of circles, each representing a bit (0 or 1). At the start of each round, all circles will be set to 0.
step4: Tap the circle to toggle its value between 0 and 1.
step5: Remember, accuracy and speed are key! The faster you convert the number, the higher your score. Good luck!
